    public abstract class AbstractBroadcastingCamera
extends AbstractSettlingCamera
implements java.lang.Runnable
    AbstractPreviewCamera handles the preview capture broadcasting aspects of a Camera.

      • cameraViewHasChanged

        public void cameraViewHasChanged​(Location location)
        Whenever a user action deliberately changes the Camera view via its position, subject, or other action, this method should be called to trigger a new image capture. If the camera is set to 0 fps or otherwise not continuously capturing, this will generate an updated camera view (subject to configuration and other constraints).
        Parameters:
        location - Location at which the view is targeted.

      • stopContinuousCapture

        public void stopContinuousCapture​(CameraListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: Camera
        Requests that the continuous capture be stopped for the previously registered listener. If the Camera has other listeners they should still receive updates.
        Specified by:
        stopContinuousCapture in interface Camera
